Text: writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List Are there any reports on the response to the activation Matthew F Cinadr Empire State Plaza Albany NY email fax Sent by PM Please respond to marketrelations To cc Subject EDRP SCR program activation writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List At today participants in the Emergency Demand Response Program and ICAP Special Case Resources were notified that the programs would be activated from through on August
